pageContext.claim: “You know we give billions of dollars to these universities and they won't allow free speech? That’s not what our country’s all about.”
pageContext.analysis: This is the caricature version of what's actually happening at some universities that have declined to host conservative or far-right speakers. Some have cited prohibitive security costs because of the unrest that some speakers were generating on campus. There is no ban on free speech at any of these universities.
